title: How can a freelance writer become a brand? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, In order to become a brand of your own, you first need to build a strong portfolio. You could find connect writing jobs on these really good freelance websites Upwork, Guru, Fiverr, People Per Hour, Freelancer, Craigslist, TextBroker, WittyPen, The Writer Finder, BloggingPro, Constant Content, iWriter and Outsourcely. These are easy to use and you will also be able to network with other writers from your field. You should also check out Internshala for internships. We hope our answer helped. Do check out our community connected and find inspiration from other freelancers.
